(OOC: Alloran, I hope you don't mind, but in this post Soundwave will 
become a TM3. I don't think you should be sad about that.)

On top of the mountain top, Soundwave had done it. He had built the 
machine to create the TM3's. Vulois was already in it. Artificial 
lighting struck and the process began. You could hear howls and 
scrams coming from Vulois which probably could've been heard around 
the planet. Once it was done, you could see the difference. His Beast 
mode was vague. It was more of a shape than actual organics, but it 
was enough to protect from energon. He had sharp claws, and rows of 
teeth.  He tried out his flying skills. He could make turns better, 
and was alot faster. He decided to try out his new mode.

"Vulois, Tank Mode!"

His neck went forward and snapped back. The body went into the form 
of a large square and sprouted wheel. The neck went into the position 
of the large cannon, which could launch missles loaded with 
explosives. He then transformed to Robot Mode.

"Vulois, Terrorize!"

You could see his new strength. Everything about him was bigger. He 
pulled out his two blasters, which could now had two holes to fire 
out of. He also had jets at the back so he could fly in robot mode.

"This is terrific. Your turn Soundwave."

He entered the pod and Vulois started pressing the buttons. In 
moments the process was finished, and out stepped the new Soundwave. 
He looke like.....(I'll let you finish that Alloran.)
